name: The Legend of Zeldaâ„¢: The Minish Cap
description: Original Release Date: January 2005 When the sorceror Vaati turns Princess Zelda to stone, the king of Hyrule sends Link on a quest that will take him to places he's never imagined. Using the power of a mystical hat called the Minish Cap, the Hylian hero will shrink down for a massive quest...on a microscopic scale! Use the magic of the cap to shrink and explore the world of the Minish lying hidden just beneath your feet! With the help of items like the Gust Jar and the Mole Mitts, shoot blasts of air or claw through dirt to reach new regions. Unravel the secrets of the Kinstones to solve puzzles, unlock hidden areas, and restore happiness to the people of Hyrule!
